hooks.command: bash -c 'case "${CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH:-}" in */src/content/docs/*) printf "{\"decision\":\"block\",\"reason\":\"src/content/docs/ is synced from icn/docs/ and gitignored. Edit the source at /home/ubuntu/projects/icn/docs/ instead, then run /sync-and-build to propagate changes.\"}" && exit 2;; esac; exit 0'

bash -c 'case "${CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH:-}" in *.astro|*.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.mjs|*.cjs|*.css|*.json|*.md) cd /home/ubuntu/projects/icn-website && npx prettier --write "${CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH}" 2>/dev/null || true;; esac'
